/.title: Whydog's playground
/.subtitle: A site dedicated to mouse-free navigation
about: I @#FF77B7want@# to be a @#00ffaafull-stack@# developer, as well as a @#00ffaaUI/UX@# designer.
This website is built with @#00ffaaReact@#, and I'm still working on it.

projects.description:
A personal website for me to showcase my projects and skills.

Use @#00ffaa'github Josh-Playground'@# to view the source code.

tools/.title: Tool box
tools/.subtitle: Here are some tools I've made

item.title: @#FFF700./listentogether
item.description: @#FFF700Listen Together@# is a web-based music player that allows you to listen to music with your friends in @#FFF700real-time@#. It supports @#00ffaaYouTube video@# and @#00ffaaplaylist@#.

item.title: @#FFF700./ytdownloader
item.description: @#FFF700YouTube Downloader@# is a web-based tool that allows you to download @#00ffaaYouTube videos@# in @#FFF700audio@# or @#FFF700video@# format.

item.title: ...coming soon
item.description: This tool is still @#FF77B7under development@#. Maybe some day it will be released. @#f9f284^w^

tools/ytdownloader/.title: YouTube Downloader
tools/ytdownloader/.subtitle: A web-based YouTube video downloader
tutorial: 1. @#FF77B7Copy@# the @#00ffaaURL@# of the @#00ffaaYouTube video@# you want to download.
2. @#FF77B7Type@# @#00ffaa'download'@# in the console and paste the @#00ffaaURL@#.
3. @#FF77B7Use@# flag @#00ffaa'-a'@# to download the @#00ffaaaudio@# only, or @#00ffaa'-v'@# to download the @#00ffaavideo@# only.

games/.title: Game center
games/.subtitle: Here are some games I've made

item.title: @#FFF700./colorgame
item.description: A simple color guessing game. Try to guess the color based on the RGB value given. Have fun!
